title: Bigg Boss Malayalam Season 6 Finale Live Updates : Mohanlal set to kickstart the showdown
body_text:
Bigg Boss Malayalam Season 6 Finale Live Updates: Mohanlal set to kickstart the showdown
The highly anticipated finale of Bigg Boss Malayalam Season 6 will air at 7 pm on Sunday, with five finalists competing for the grand prize of Rs 50 lakh and the trophy. Jinto, Jasmine, Arjun, Rishi, and Abhishek are the five contestants who have made it to the final. Hosted by Mohanlal, the season saw a record-breaking 19 contestants and an additional six joining midway.
